apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this couple emoji showcases a tender embrace between a man with a medium-dark skin tone and a woman rendered in Apple's default neutral skin tone, unified by a vibrant, glossy heart floating between them. The heart, a signature of Apple's design, is bright red with subtle highlights, symbolizing deep affection and connection. Their poses are intimate yet respectful, reflecting a loving bond and shared joy, a perfect visual representation of romantic love on Apple devices.
